name: WP Database Audit
author: Truong Vu

sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings > Database Audit to watch the records changes
sections.description:
Watch your WordPress database changes.

WP Database Audit

Watch your WordPress database changes, able to export those changes to SQL files at the moment it was activated.

Requirements

  • Php5 and above
  • Mysqli
  • Database account need to have permission to create mysql trigger
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings > Database Audit to watch the records changes
